mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_RBOARD( RKBNUM, KBNUM, RKBNAME, RKBCONTENT, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE ) VALUES ( #{rkbnum}, #{kbnum}, #{rkbname}, #{rkbcontent}, 'Y', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.RKBNUM RKBNUM ,A.KBNUM KBNUM ,A.RKBNAME RKBNAME ,A.RKBCONTENT RKBCONTENT ,A.INSERTDATE INSERTDATE FROM KOSMO_RBOARD A WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.KBNUM = #{kbnum} ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE KOSMO_RBOARD SET DELETEYN = 'N', INSERTDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND RKBNUM = #{rkbnum}
